701349f-a.text:
Jerome Ave., east side, slightly south of the S.E. corner of Morris Ave., showing a 2-story frame house and shed occupying that site. It adjoins(to the south of)the 6-story apartment house bearing No. 2816. The dirt road shown in the view was formerly known as Parkview Terrace and ran north from East 196th Street to Morris Ave. It is now (1937) the east side of Jerome Ave. The view is in a northerly direction.
May 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701349f-a.folder: Jerome Avenue & Morris Avenue, Bronx, NY
